marklogic.body:
Nothing is more important than good posture to prevent aches and pains. Good posture can make you look taller, slimmer and more confident and help speed recovery from low-Back pain and prevent its recurrence. Think of good posture as an instant makeover! Â
And watch those high-heeled shoes that unnaturally place the heels above the toes and can throw Off your body's entire alignment. The spine has specially designed curves that evenly distribute your weight. High heels alter these curves, and place uneven wear on the discs, the joints, and the ligaments of the back.
